headline: Is PayPal (PYPL) Undervalued After Recent Share Price Weakness? A Fresh Look at Its Valuation
summary: PayPal Holdings (PYPL) has quietly slipped again, with the stock down about 7% over the past month and more than 10% in the past 3 months, despite steady revenue and profit growth. See our latest analysis for PayPal Holdings. Zooming out, the 1 year total shareholder return of about negative 31 percent and a year to date share price return near negative 29 percent signal that sentiment has been fading even as PayPal keeps posting reasonable top line and bottom line growth. If PayPal easing...
